sobremi.PARRAFO: Hello! My name is Facundo Zylinski, I'm 23 years old and I have had a great passion for technology and computing since I was a child. Currently, I'm studying Computer Engineering, a career that I'm really passionate about and that has allowed me to keep discovering the potential of this industry.</br></br>I'm a proactive person, with a strong desire to learn and grow both professionally and intellectually. I consider myself a self-taught person and I enjoy investigating and discovering new solutions to the challenges that come my way. I believe that there is always something new to learn, and that's why I like to be in constant evolution.</br></br>I love to take on challenges and tackle complex problems, as they allow me to grow and improve as a professional. I think that technology is a fascinating field that is constantly evolving, and I would like to be part of a team that is at the forefront of this industry. I'm convinced that I can bring a lot of value to any company that is looking for a profile like mine.</br></br>I'm a responsible and committed person, with skills to work in a team and adapt to different situations. I'm motivated to work in a collaborative and growth-oriented environment, where I can contribute my knowledge and learn from other professionals.</br></br>If you're looking for someone motivated, proactive, and with great potential, don't hesitate to contact me. I'm sure we can work together to achieve great things!
